statement.p: The effect of silver nanoparticle (SNP) and Zataria multiflora essential oil (ZEO) on removal one-day old biofilm of Staph. aureus ( a) and Salm. Typhimurium ( b) developed on polystyrene surface with 15 min contact time. Different letters for each concentration of antimicrobial indicate a statistically significant difference ( P < 0.05).
